selected_quotes: #9 most read in Aug: Affirmative action bans had little immediate effect on most universities except in 8 states.
#6 most read in Sept: Selective colleges in states with affirmative action bans enroll fewer minorities. #edresearch
#9 most read in Oct: #edresearch shows affirmative action loss sends ripples into nearby states' college admissions.
Changes in Levels of Affirmative Action in College Admissions #WhyDiversityInHigherEd
New from AERA Journals: State Bans on Affirmative Action Have Spillover Effect on Adjacent States #edresearch

news.title: Feds Eye Race-Based Admissions Complaint Against Harvard
news.summary: A discrimination complaint lodged against Harvard's admissions process in 2015 by Asian-American groups could get a fresh look by the Department of Justice — setting the stage for renewed debate on the constitutionality of affirmative action.
